Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38127 affecting package binutils for versions less than 2.37-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-38127 affecting package binutils for versions less than 2.37-8. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package binutils is earlier than 2.37-8, affected by CVE-2022-38127
